description: valence readAloud task: error was corrected
detail: indication, for a disfluent syllable, of whether the participant repeated themselves in an attempt (successful or not) to correct a prior error

description: valence readAloud task: last syllable before a correction
detail: indication, when a participant has revised their production to make a correction, of the last syllable produced before the regression
valueInfo: 0, not last pre-correction syllable | 1, last pre-correction syllable

description: valence readAloud task: actual words/nonwords produced
detail: indication, for disfluent word(s) of the word or nonword actually produced

description: valence readAloud task: correction produced
detail: indication, for attempted corrections, of the word(s) actually produced

description: valence readAloud task: types of coded errors
detail: the various error types that are coded for in the ErrorCoding protocol
allowedValues: mispron, wordstress, duplicate, insertion, hesitation, elongation, omission, flipped

description: valence readAloud task: identity of a disfluent syllable
detail: identity of a syllable identified as disfluent in ErrorCoding

description: valence readAloud task: identity of a correctly-produced syllable (matched to an errorSyll)
detail: identity of a correct syllable matched to a specific errorSyll

description: valence readAloud task: coded error/correct syllables
detail: markers for specific syllables in a given participant's production

description: valence readAloud task: identities of error/correct syllables
detail: either an errorSyll or matchSyll, in optimized format for timestamp coding
